summary: On one day, in one city, the world comes together to grant one 5 year old cancer patient his wish. Batkid Begins looks at the 'why' of this flash phenomenon.
cast: Teresa Clovicko|Audrey Copper|Katie Cotton|James Coyne|John Coyne|Ama Daetz|Mike DeJesus|Eric Johnston|Sue Graham Johnston|Mike Jutan|Barry Kendall|Naomi Kyle|Edwin M. Lee|Or Oppenheimer|Ron Oppenheimer|Stefania Pomponi|Miles Scott|Natalie Scott|Nick Scott|Greg Suhr|Chris Taylor|Christopher Verdosci|Burt Ward|Philip Watt|Jen Wilson|Patricia Wilson|Joel Zimei|Hans Zimmer
keywords: superhero|dc comics|gagged|bound and gagged|damsel in distress
title: Batkid Begins
